text: Farrah Rachael Forke (January 12, 1968 – February 25, 2022) was an American actress. She was known for her role as Alex Lambert on the NBC sitcom Wings and Mayson Drake on Lois and Clark: The New Adventures of Superman. She also voiced Big Barda on the animated television series Batman Beyond and Justice League Unlimited. Forke died from cancer on February 25, 2022, at the age of 54, in Houston, Texas.Farrah Forke, ‘Wings’ and ‘Lois & Clark’ Actor, Dies at 54 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Corpus Christi, Texas
title: Farrah Forke
